鑖字的基本解释

鑖
miè
小锥子。

鑖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［miè］
［《集韻》莫結切，入屑，明。］
(1)小铤。
(2)作人名用字。明代有朱徵鑖。见《明史·襄陵王沖秌传》。

鑖字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鑖； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1325第21
【集韻】莫結切，音蔑。【博雅】鑖，䥡鋌也。　又【集韻】彌計切，音謎。小釜。

鑖字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
鑖字的起名意思

暂无。

鑖
Basic explanation of words
鑖
miè
Little awl.
鑖
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［miè］
["Jiyun" Do not cut, enter the crumbs, and make clear. ]
(1) Small collar.
(2) Use words for names. There was Zhu Zhengyan in the Ming Dynasty. See "The History of Ming Dynasty·The Biography of Xiangling King Chongsi".
鑖
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鑖; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1325-21
[Ji Yun] Do not cut, the sound is contemptuous. [Bo Ya] 鑖，䥡铤也.　 [Ji Yun] Mi Ji cut, sound puzzle. Little cauldron.
